scenes.action_text: THE CHANGE-UP Written by Jon Lucas & Scott Moore July 31, 2009 OPEN ON: PEACEFUL BLACK STILLNESS Then we hear a baby SCREAM BLOODY MURDER. Then a second baby joins in, even more shrill than the first. Finally, we hear the worst two words a parent can ever hear: GROGGY WOMAN'S VOICE (O.S.) Your turn. GROGGY MAN'S VOICE (O.S.) Fuck. INT. SUBURBAN HOUSE -- NIGHT </
